page.title: 15Entertainment
page.content: Entertainment is to be found in schools, hotels, in the playpark and in the Fleming Hall and other halls. In the schools there are sometimes concerts plays or pantomines, as well as discos. Christmas parties, outings, fireworks and playschemes are arranged by schools and the community, while dances and discos take place in the Fleming Hall and in the hotels. Some people travel to Elgin, Inverness or Aberdeen to see concerts, films and shows. There is a public library beside the High School which is well stocked by the Library Service.
